channel.title: [317] Aggroth V4 Re-Release [Ready2Host] [No MySQL]
channel.description:
[center][b][u][size=18pt]This is a re-release of Aggroth V4, the source was edited by Sk8rdude461, this is the same exact source with the MySQL disabled[/size][/u][/b][/center]
[center][b]Original Source Release:[/b] https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664755.0.html
[b]Change's that were made:[/b] [quote="Sk8rdude461"]Hey guys, I've just done a couple of "fixes" because I'm tired of seeing 800 help topics over the EXACT SAME issues. Literally. So here's what I did: Edited the client compiler, now compiles the signlink file in the signlink folder. Changed the client IP to localhost. Search "localhost" in client.java to change it. Compiled the client. Ran the client. Verified the client works and the cache downloaded Ran the server. Logged into client from server. Disabled most, if not all MySQL data. It's controlled by the boolean I added in Config.java Compiled server. Ran server. Tested once by logging in, no MySQL related errors on login. I did not change any core functions or components, or anything really. I simply added a boolean to control the MySQL.
99.99% credits to Shaloxis or Coldmedicine or whoever made it.
.000000001% for me disabled MySQL and recompiling.[/quote]
[b]Credits:[/b] Coldmedicene (Cant be arsed naming all that) Ryan (Fixed ALOT of bugs and added a nice quest) InsidiaX (Base) TrisidiaX (Skilltab) Tokashi (508 maps) Sk8rdude461 (Disabling MySQL and making this super easy to run, and host for beginners / unexperienced programmers)
[b]No errors on startup, and this was downloaded and ran no edit needed:[/b] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/21j9keo.png[/img]
[b][u]Edited source download link:[/u][/b] http://canyourcode.com/rsps/Aggroth_Edited.zip

item.title: [317] Aggroth V4 Re-Release [Ready2Host] [No MySQL]
item.dc:creator: @Oratic Oratic
item.description:
@Oratic wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:11, topic:551655”][quote author=Oratic link=topic=670570.msg4495314#msg4495314 date=1441733967]
Hey guys I am new and was trying out the source and stuff you guys provided, I edited the compilers and such to my current version of JDK.
The problem I have is that it isn’t compiling, it says "Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details."
I read on here those don’t impact the compiler doing what it is supposed to, but I changed my rights to owner and gave my self some dung points and it didn’t work at all.
It would help a lot if you let me know what I have to do to correct this?
I was looking around to try to fix it, but I can’t find a solution.
[/quote]

Those 2 messages are notes.
They don’t do much more than what they say.

If no errors showed in the compiler, and only those notes do, then you compiled successfully.

As for changing rights/points: You can only manipulate a character file when they are not logged in. If you edit it while they are logged in, the server will just overwrite the changes (Between when you made them and when they logout).[/quote]

For some reason I can not find the cache, can anyone tell me where to find it?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Aggroth V4 Re-Release [Ready2Host] [No MySQL]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Oratic, post:10, topic:551655”]Hey guys I am new and was trying out the source and stuff you guys provided, I edited the compilers and such to my current version of JDK.
The problem I have is that it isn’t compiling, it says "Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details."
I read on here those don’t impact the compiler doing what it is supposed to, but I changed my rights to owner and gave my self some dung points and it didn’t work at all.
It would help a lot if you let me know what I have to do to correct this?
I was looking around to try to fix it, but I can’t find a solution.[/quote]

Those 2 messages are notes.
They don’t do much more than what they say.

If no errors showed in the compiler, and only those notes do, then you compiled successfully.

As for changing rights/points: You can only manipulate a character file when they are not logged in. If you edit it while they are logged in, the server will just overwrite the changes (Between when you made them and when they logout).

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Aggroth V4 Re-Release [Ready2Host] [No MySQL]
item.dc:creator: @Oratic Oratic
item.description:
@Oratic wrote:

Hey guys I am new and was trying out the source and stuff you guys provided, I edited the compilers and such to my current version of JDK.
The problem I have is that it isn’t compiling, it says "Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details."
I read on here those don’t impact the compiler doing what it is supposed to, but I changed my rights to owner and gave my self some dung points and it didn’t work at all.
It would help a lot if you let me know what I have to do to correct this?
I was looking around to try to fix it, but I can’t find a solution.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Aggroth V4 Re-Release [Ready2Host] [No MySQL]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Coldmedicine, post:8, topic:551655”]I gave no permission for this at all.
The reason why i left MySQL in it, is when people cant even disable that, they shouldnt be touching my version at all.

Please remove this…[/quote]
Lol remove the topic all you want, I’m not removing the download.

Mostly because you knew about it, and I had even said something about it on your thread. Which I’m pretty sure is where Fohammer got the idea to post this topic in the first place.

Also, how long does it take you to notice things holy hell?

Here’s proof you knew about it:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:28, topic:545873”]I’ve edited Aggroth V4 and made a copy of it avalible here
I added one single text file that explains everything I did.
Please understand I did literally no extensive testing. The only test I did was logging in.

Here’s the contents of the text file I added:

[quote]Hey guys, I’ve just done a couple of “fixes” because I’m tired of seeing 800 help topics over the EXACT SAME issues. Literally.
So here’s what I did:
Edited the client compiler, now compiles the signlink file in the signlink folder.
Changed the client IP to localhost. Search “localhost” in client.java to change it.
Compiled the client.
Ran the client.
Verified the client works and the cache downloaded
Ran the server.
Logged into client from server.
Disabled most, if not all MySQL data. It’s controlled by the boolean I added in Config.java
Compiled server.
Ran server.
Tested once by logging in, no MySQL related errors on login.
I did not change any core functions or components, or anything really. I simply added a boolean to control the MySQL.

99.99% credits to Shaloxis or Coldmedicine or whoever made it.

.000000001% for me disabled MySQL and recompiling.[/quote]

As far as I know, it works. I logged in and there was no MySQL issues, and the cache also downloaded fine.
It’s up to you know.
[size=14pt]Here’s the download once more. In case you didn’t see me say it before[/size][/quote]
And the reply directly underneath that?:

[quote=“Coldmedicine, post:29, topic:545873”]That moment when a server helper is active on your thread.

-Giggedy’s with a quagmire face-[/quote]

One last thing…

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

The download on the OP (Which is quoted by you FROM ME) goes to my website… It goes to… wait for it… the exact same download that’s listed here

It’s almost as if Fohammer was just trying to get more people to use the “working” copy, since they couldn’t figure out the copy you gave them.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Aggroth V4 Re-Release [Ready2Host] [No MySQL]
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:551655”][quote author=FoHammer link=topic=670570.msg4484007#msg4484007 date=1432658137]

Click me for all the RSPS downloads

I’ve created an index page for the downloads instead of having random links all over the place for each file.

*Not a web designer/developer.

I believe you sir, are a genius because you really simplify alot of things. Nice work, you should share that.
[/quote]
I only want to put servers on there that are “ready to run”. Models, sprites, or etc I’m less worried about them containing ints or the interface data… But servers, I’d like for them to be able to be unzipped and ran, and it’s working… That doesn’t mean there’s no bugs or issues, but there’s no issue setting it up for the first time. If that makes sense.[/quote]

Yes easily accessible and usable, right from the download, correct? But just because it starts up right away and works, doesn’t mean there isn’t errors?

Read full topic

I only want to put servers on there that are “ready to run”. Models, sprites, or etc I’m less worried about them containing ints or the interface data… But servers, I’d like for them to be able to be unzipped and ran, and it’s working… That doesn’t mean there’s no bugs or issues, but there’s no issue setting it up for the first time. If that makes sense.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Aggroth V4 Re-Release [Ready2Host] [No MySQL]
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

[center][size=18pt]This is a re-release of Aggroth V4, the source was edited by Sk8rdude461, this is the same exact source with the MySQL disabled[/size][/center]

[center]Original Source Release:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664755.0.html

Change’s that were made:

[quote=“Sk8rdude461”]Hey guys, I’ve just done a couple of “fixes” because I’m tired of seeing 800 help topics over the EXACT SAME issues. Literally.
So here’s what I did:
Edited the client compiler, now compiles the signlink file in the signlink folder.
Changed the client IP to localhost. Search “localhost” in client.java to change it.
Compiled the client.
Ran the client.
Verified the client works and the cache downloaded
Ran the server.
Logged into client from server.
Disabled most, if not all MySQL data. It’s controlled by the boolean I added in Config.java
Compiled server.
Ran server.
Tested once by logging in, no MySQL related errors on login.
I did not change any core functions or components, or anything really. I simply added a boolean to control the MySQL.

99.99% credits to Shaloxis or Coldmedicine or whoever made it.

.000000001% for me disabled MySQL and recompiling.[/quote]

Credits:
Coldmedicene (Cant be arsed naming all that)
Ryan (Fixed ALOT of bugs and added a nice quest)
InsidiaX (Base)
TrisidiaX (Skilltab)
Tokashi (508 maps)
Sk8rdude461 (Disabling MySQL and making this super easy to run, and host for beginners / unexperienced programmers)

No errors on startup, and this was downloaded and ran no edit needed:

Edited source download link:
http://canyourcode.com/rsps/Aggroth_Edited.zip
